Class MainActivity

extends Activity
    Main app Activity. Show diagram and text.

    android 2.3.3

    1.00, 13.06.2013

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MainActivity.MyTask
      AsyncTask that loads text to the right side of the screen after user picks a diagram sector.
      class  MainActivity.MyTask2
      AsyncTask that minimizes text data back to diagram and changes the UI elements' states if necessary.
